item.title: SLB
item.description: score:88 Chances: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Schlumberger (SLB) is equivalent to a Buy. The market is calm for now, but it is prudent to position your portfolio for the eventual volatility later this year. Fundamentals show a solid outlook for corporate earnings as recent Q4 2023 results revealed that companies beat market expectations with concrete results.
